Игра очень не плохая. Мой любимый момент, когда я бежал от маньяка, он уже замахнулся и в мыслях было только одно "ну всё, пожили и хватит". Вот он меня уже ударил, но в последний момент, из-за пинга меня ТЕЛЕПОРТИРУЕТ НАЗАД И В КОНЕЧНОМ ИТОГЕ Я БЕЖАЛ ЗА НИМ, А ОН ПРОСТО ПОНЯТЬ НЕ МОГ "ГДЕ ЭТОТ ЗАСРАНЕЦ???" Это был лучший мув в моей жизни. Спасибо вам, разработчики дбд за незабываемые моменты)

Игра несомненно уникальная и лучшая в своём роде , и я считаю , что она стоит того , чтобы её хотя бы попробовать.
К сожалению , разработчики ломают баланс, сначала в одну сторону, потом в другую...так что , играть или нет - лишь на ваше усмотрение , так как у игры имеется ряд проблем , как и технических , так и геймплейных .
игра очень классная стоит своих денег для игры. Но лучше всего играть с друзьями а так она может вам надоесть
Aparentemente muito divertido, mas como só joguei de killer ainda, não sei como deve ser a gameplay como sobrevivente.

黎明杀鸡团队从16年10月的第一个免费更新开始，到现在孜孜不倦的进行新的游戏内容的探索与完善，不断的从玩家口中听从意见，建立友好的游戏圈子，举办线下活动和线上开发者访谈，甚至制作并更新了游戏小剧场。虽然每个版本依然bug频频，游戏的平衡性也一直会让部分玩家头恼，但是黎明杀鸡团队对这个游戏的坚持和奉献真的值得被颁发一个“爱的付出”奖！

이 게임의 좆같은 문제점들은 많이 있지만 그 중 제일빡치는점은 게임을 안하는 새끼들 투성이라는거다

게임을 하면 절반 혹은 70퍼이상의 살인마들은 가만히 있고 칼만 휘두른다.

그렇다 그냥 오토 켜놓고 잠수하는 것이다. 그렇다고 그걸 신고한다고 제재를 가하는가?

그런 플레이어에게 제재를 가하는지 알려주지도 않을뿐더러, 제재를 했다면 게임의 70퍼이상이 잠수 살인마 겠는가?

당신은 한판의 재대로 된게임을 위해 최소 3~4판은 돌려야 한다는 것을 명심해라 시간이 아깝다.
super jeu mais beaucoup de camper!!!!

[h1]Pros:[/h1]  Dead By Daylight makes me come back and re-visit the game year, after year, and I never seem to get bored or burnt out because of its enticing game-play. It's apparent to me that the developers, trust and safety team, community monitors, and all that are contributing to this game, care about the game's development and those who are passionate about the game, the players. As someone who has purchased this game at its release date here on, Steam. Someone who continues to be a heavy advocate for oncoming news about the game, nothing objectively disappoints, regarding the updates. The atmosphere and cinematic pleasure is outstanding for every map. The movement is fluent and enjoyable on both sides. The animations get better and improve in complexity. The perk system is unique and consistent. This game has made a lot of warm memories for me to cherish. I've met long time friends through this game. 


[h1]Cons:[/h1]  The game has a HUGE hit-box issue, ever since the game has been released. This issue effects both sides, the Survivors, and the Killers. The believed reason for this is, the game seems to be using basic hit-boxes instead of animated hit-boxes for vaulting pallets and windows. For those who don't understand the difference, I'll explain. "Basic hit-box", will play the animation where the avatar is located, so your hit-box will be on the window or pallet until the animation is done. While an, "Animated Hit-box", will move the hit-box as the avatar moves. Why haven't they switched over to animated hit-boxes? I'll never know, maybe it's more of a complicated transfer then I realize. Back in 2017, there was an exploit where your save file would be deleted. This could sometimes be caused if you played Dead By Daylight when Steam would do their weekly server resets. Thankfully, this does not occur anymore. 


[h1]Final Thoughts?:[/h1]   I've had my fair share of aggression regarding this game, I will not lie. So much so that I've developed a love/hate relationship with this game. But the developers have their heart in the right place with this game and what they've made and are continuing to make is truly beautiful. That means a lot to me as a constant consumer of video games and virtual entertainment. A constant redundant phrase, but it's true. Video games are by no-means perfect in every category. This game is, by all means, no exception. But there are some talented individuals trying their best to encompass us in this virtual world they've created. That goes for most ambitious video game creators. If you can make me come back to your game year, after year. You're doing something right. The game's addicting.

 "I think we did a pretty good job so far."

Pretty good game, overall with a lot of mechanics you can use to either catch survivors or escape killers, a lot of learning involved and mostly a lot of grinding for the correct perks, although a lot of different builds are very viable in their own unique situations. Would definitely suggest this game to anyone interested, nothing P2W, most new killers are able to be earned through currency you earn called "iridescent shards" and P2P killers perks are not required to pay for, iridescent shards can be spent on weekly shrine of secrets to gain them.

All the survivors and killers in the game have different perks and abilities. The various perk combinations, killers, and maps give this game endless replayability. I honestly love this game and hate it at the same time. It really just comes down to who you match with. You can either get super toxic people who want to ruin your night, people who joke around and make the game really enjoyable, or try hards which can be a toss up of either scenario. All in all I hate the community and the devs but love the game. Even with a lot of toxicity it has its moments and if you play killer you can pretty much drive the match any way you want for the most part. Dont solo queue as survivor unless you're ready to be a one man team.

bueno antes que nada hola ahora si voy a dar mi reseña.

puntos a favor del juego:
tiene lugares para lopear desde lugares infinitos hasta lugares donde no se puede lopear dependiendo el mapa xD.
tiene una buena cantidad de killers y survis. tambien tiene mapas,accesorios, habilidades tanto de ambos bandos de killer y survi etc
tiene partidas con amigos tanto privadas como publicas
tiene eventos cada cierto tiempo.
tiene pase+desafios que te hacen viciar mas al juego y te dan puntos etc
y te da horas de diversion para rato pagando o sin pagar los dlc etc.

puntos negativos:
tiene bugs y cada vez que arreglan 1 vienen 10 nuevos bugs
tiene una comunidad 50 y 50 tanto buena como nefasta por los killers tuneleros,camperos,slugeros etc. que arruinan bastante la experiencia del juego.
mi recomendacion para jugar mejor y divertirte es hacerlo con amigos por que siempre tocan randoms trolean,toxiquean,se van y te dejan tirado. por ultimo a veces los survis o killers putean mucho en el canal de texto cuando termina la partida mi recomendacion es ignorar a los killer y survis o sino desactivar el canal de texto y tendras mejor experiencia seria jugar y irte y no comerte insultos etc.

espero que les haya servido mi reseña muchas gracias por leer. <3

有名な生存者4人VS殺人鬼1人の非対称マルチプレイゲームです。

パークが揃って遊べるまで少し時間がかかるゲームですが、揃ってしまえば大変面白いのでオススメです。
儀式に勝てなくてもポイントは貰えますので、育成も楽しみの１つです。
ぜひ、続けてやってみてほしいです。やっぱり合わないなって判断するのはそれからでも遅くないと思います。

Jogo muito divertido para jogar com os amigos, e mesmo se não tiver amigos você vai acabar fazendo amizade com o pessoal e vai acabar tendo um grupo legal para jogar.

Tem uma grande disputa entre os jogadores que são main Survivors e os que são main Killer, mas no final o que vale é se divertir.

Outra grande vantagem é que os desenvolvedores estão sempre lançando coisa nova no jogo para movimentar a comunidade.

Recomendado com toda certeza.

A huge amount of progress has gone on with this game over the last 5 years of it's release and I must say I have enjoyed the time and gameplay it has turned into today. If you like objective gameplay and being hunted down like a fox in the woods while you try to fix generators then play yourself a survivor and find out if you have what it takes, solo or with friends either way I enjoy the quality of content this game brings to the table. If you are feeling like you want to become the beast sort of speak, then play the killer and hunt down the four survivors in what can become a stressful chase or a one side domination in the woods that leave nothing but the blood and screams of your victims. Just try this game out trust me, you will not regret it!

I always seem to fall back to this game when I'm bored and feel like playing something.  I enjoy the game, and I've been playing for about three years now.  I don't really like the direction BHVR is going with rift passes and how they handle PTB feedback, but I still find myself playing regardless.

Since the release of the Twins killer, there have been quite a few bugs introduced into the game that have negatively impacted my gameplay.  The 4.5 Mid-chapter update in which the HUD was reworked also brought just as many new bugs into the mix.  The game is still enjoyable, but these last two updates definitely went in the wrong direction.  Multiplayer connectivity (latency) issues have increased significantly, and I experience issues nearly every match where the killer hits me from MUCH further away than before the 4.5 patch.

I probably would not recommend this game if you play solo, but with a group of up to four friends, you can have a good bit of fun.  Also, you should be aware that the learning curve is a bit steep (~10-20 hours before you're proficient) and matchmaking continues to pit rank #1-4 killers against #16-20 survivors and vice versa.

You play as a regular ol' joe or mam after a hurricane has just devastated your floridian neighborhood. The coast guard are too busy fighting off alligators, so you and your neighbors try to restore power by fixing up those generators you got from Home Depot a couple of years back just for this occasion. But its not that easy, because of course it isn't, this is florida. You must watch out and avoid a crazed floridian cultist who is out on the loose trying to murder you and your buddies to appease the death gods, or to get on the news or whatever. Only once you fix the generators and activate the gates, can you can finally escape the floridian lunatic and get the f*ck out of the hellhole that was once your home. 

Tl;dr Game is a message urging individuals to evacuate florida.

Edit: forgot about playing as the killer. yeah, you can do that too

over all it was great!

Dead by Daylight é um jogo que já lançou já faz 5 anos, os desenvolvedores estão cheio da grana, mas não tem competência nenhuma em arrumar o maldito jogo. Toda vez que atualiza o jogo vem com problemas. A Behavior não consegue fazer o único joguinho dela não ter algum bug, glitch, problemas de desempenho, conexão, crash e etc. Toda atualização é isso, chega a ser piada não conseguirem contratar programadores competentes que consigam arrumar o game. Não recomendo que compre o jogo, a não ser que você queira se estressar e passar raiva nisso, sabendo que esses problemas nunca serão sanados. A Behavior devia dar Auric Cell (moeda do jogo) como desculpa também, pra ver se tomam vergonha na cara. Se eu pudesse pediria reembolso, mesmo com as mil horas de jogo. Sim, tenho mil horas nesse jogo, mas não abandono, pois foi tempo e dinheiro investido nisso, ainda mais, jogar com amigos é o único jeito de se divertir. Mathieu Cote você é uma piada, com todos esses problemas não consegue arrumar um bug se quer, devia pedir demissão e deixar outra pessoa assumir nisso.

It's honestly a fine game with its fair share of flaws. I think it's really hard to get into when you're brand new to the game since you have to unlock the perk slots needed to actually make a solid perk build for a character. I personally think the game's easy to grasp yet hard to master. People with 500+ hours in this game always have something new to learn, especially with each DLC they release every so often.

There's 7 generators on the map at the start of the match. 4 survivors work together to try getting 5 of them done, opening one of the 2 exit gates, and escaping. The killer's job is to essentially do everything in their power to keep you and your teammates from doing just that; Surviving.

Of course the game has its flaws, (The insane hitboxes, multiple smurfs, toxic community, "Meta" builds, Awful killer auto aim, a large number of perks having little to no real use in a match, etc.) but nothing's more euphoric than outsmarting a skilled killer or full queue Survive With Friends.

For 20 bucks, it really is quite a nice game. The devs have currently been working toward making the game better with each patch and update. It also goes on sale often, so you might be able to snag it for like 15-8 bucks? 

If you're gonna get it, harass and bully your friends into getting it too. Playing survivor with 3 other buddies is leagues more fun than soloing in my opinion.

Oh yeah, the Ash Vs Evil Dead DLC is dope as hell.
